reviewText: This easy-to-follow video guide let me see exactly what I needed to do to refurbish my home.  Plus the VHS box included a handy Project Guide, making preparation and execution simple.
PERFIT FOR TEACHING AT ORLEANS TECH INST.

I didn't like the video for two reasons:
First, the video quality is extremely poor, and there are constant noise throughout the program Second, there are way many ads. I would have returned it if there is a choice.
Same comments go to other videos they produced: such a wood floor installation, and patio etc.
